title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Building reliable operations, feat. Fannie Mae (COP340)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 构建可靠的运营，特邀房利美 (COP340)
abstract: Managing incidents effectively across complex infrastructure remains a challenge for many organizations. In this session, learn proven practices for building reliable operations and reducing Mean Time to Resolution (MTTR) through effective incident management. We'll showcase how Fannie Mae transformed their operations by building a cross-region observability platform on AWS, enabling them to automate incident response and improve reliability across their hybrid environment. Walk away with practical strategies for implementing automated incident management, establishing effective on-call processes, and leveraging AWS services to enhance operational reliability within your organization.
abstract_cn: 对于许多组织而言，在复杂基础设施中有效管理事件仍然是一项挑战。在本次会议中，了解通过有效的事件管理来构建可靠运营并缩短平均解决时间（MTTR）的成熟实践。我们将展示房利美如何通过在 AWS 上构建跨区域可观测性平台来转变其运营，使他们能够自动化事件响应并提高混合环境中的可靠性。您将获得实用策略，用于实施自动化事件管理、建立有效的值班流程，以及利用 AWS 服务来增强组织内的运营可靠性。

presenter.name: Steve Rice
presenter.title: General Manager, AWS AppConfig & Parameter Store
